item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Chamber Edward Thomas Settings (2020) for countertenor, alto flute, bass clarinet, Bb trumpet, tenor trombone, percussion, piano, and double bass - approx. 12 minutes In Memoriam (Easter, 1915) The flowers left thick at nightfall in the wood This Eastertide call into mind the men, Now far from home, who, with their sweethearts, should Have gathered them and will do never again. The Combe The Combe was ever dark, ancient and dark.

item.title: THE SONG of LOS
item.description: William Blake AFRICA I will sing you a song of Los. the Eternal Prophet: He sung it to four harps at the tables of Eternity. In heart-formed Africa. Urizen faded! Ariston shudderd! And thus the Song began Adam stood in the garden of Eden: And Noah on the mountains of Ararat; They saw Urizen give his Laws to the Nations By the hands of the children of Los. Adam shudderd! Noah faded!
